name: Fall of corruption
description: “Fall of corruption” was created by Kaveh Ahangar from Dubai, painted live on a mural while playing music in reaction to the vacancy of Peruvian ex-president Vizcarra, where 2 young marchers died in November 2020.   This painting became the cover artwork of “Ahora no duermes”, a poem by Eduardo Tokeshi, made into a song, produced by La Rara Records: https://larararecords.bandcamp.com/track/ahora-que-no-duermes >>> 50% of the revenue from this release will be towards tree reforestation in the Peruvian jungle thanks to Reforestamos por Naturaleza (reforesta.pe).
